intro: Borneacanthus grandifolius, commonly known as the Bornean swordleaf, is a flowering plant native to the rainforests of Borneo. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its large, lance-shaped leaves that can grow up to 30 centimeters in length. Due to habitat loss, Borneacanthus grandifolius is considered a rare and endangered species.
